app development with phonegap & drupalgap

Submitted by ansondparker on Thu, 02/05/2015 - 10:54

For those keeping score we're working on a stripped down version of the site to be released as an app - first for Android, and later for iThings...  DrupalGap is the glue that's putting the whole thing together, and Tyler Frankenstein is the geek who makes that possible - thanks for the help man - great work!I've been pretty averse to apps in general - they seem cliche and hip... things to avoid...

Adding custom SMS messaging

Submitted by ansondparker on Mon, 01/26/2015 - 17:16

SMS Alerts Now AvailableIf you're interested in getting messages sent to you go to your profile page and add your phone number and carrier - any new issues that come up within your interests will be forwarded to your phone.

Drupal, 18F compliance, and Charlottesville

Submitted by ansondparker on Thu, 01/22/2015 - 21:01

The tech underneath this site is Drupal 7.  It's an off-the-shelf distribution, put together with as few modules and patches as possible, customized to fit as neatly with the existing workflow of our city council as possible.
